place.note: Unknown Burac, possibly Bugnac at Tarabel.
This XML ID is used for descriptions of journeys, usually with 'associare' or 'ducere'. The element will contain placenames to compose 'the journey'.
This XML ID is used for descriptions of unnamed places between other names places. The element will contain placenames.
